tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I am 47 years old IT professional and I was suffering from gradual teeth gap widening and misalignment due to aging factor. After my late thirties, a huge gap developed between my central incisors and somehow it started impacting my public speaking activities as my lips could not cover the protruding upper incisor teeth.  

Fortunately, I met Dr. Soham Mallick to whom I showed my 25 years old picture and asked, ‚ÄúCan my teeth become beautiful again like my teeth in this picture ?‚Äù. Dr. Soham‚Äôs emphatic and straight reply was ‚ÄúYes‚Äù and it eliminated all my doubts and made me determined to get my Orthodontics treatment with him.

Getting my teeth re-aligned was certainly an arduous task to which Dr. Soham dealt very scientifically applying his previous experience understanding my teeth anatomy. One of his biggest feat is to complete my treatment without surgical interventions, which I initially presumed to be inevitable. Kudos to Dr. Soham‚Äôs diligent and perseverance endeavor to make my teeth back as it was when I was in 20s. 

I would strongly recommend Dr. Soham to all as he possess deep Orthodontics acumen and integrity who circumvent patient‚Äôs irrational medical expense making the treatment cost effective too.
reply_text: Thank you so much for this detailed and such a motivating review mr avanish! Im glad that my efforts finally bore fruit for you and your daughter! It was a pleasure treating you both!

I was under Dr. Soham's treatment for teeth alignment with the help of Damon braces. The entire process was smooth and almost painless. The best part about Dr. Soham is that he doesn't rush through the treatment. He makes sure that things are perfect to go ahead with so that the chance of a relapse is avoided.
Overall, I'm happy with the treatment.
reply_text: Thank you glennis you were an absolute joy to treat! Do be in touch!

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
Both Dr. Soham and Dr. Rusabh explained the pros and cons of artificial teeth before proceeding with the treatment..
I must say ,apart from the initial pain and discomfort after extracting my front teeth, there was no other discomfort whatsoever.
They have both done a wonderful job. The teeth look natural and are quite comfortable.
Thank you Dr. Soham and Dr. Rusabh once again.

review:
I was totally confused before meeting Doctor Soham Mallick  weather  I should go for braces or aligners. Dr. Soham Mallick was extremely professional and connected with me well, he clarified all my doubts and got me started on my FLASH aligners journey. My experience with Dr. Soham has been extremely good. It's been a smooth journey, with expert dental advice at each stage.

FLASH aligners fit my teeth perfectly. I'm not facing any issue with speech or confidence. Totally worth it! 

Self-confidence changes once you have right smile on your face and all the credit goes to Dr. Soham Mallick.
